adcp_version.description: AdCP schema version used for this response

properties.description: Array of all properties this agent is authorized to represent

tags.description: Metadata for each tag referenced by properties

description.description: Description of what this tag represents

capabilities_description.description: Markdown-formatted description of the sales agent's capabilities, inventory types, audience targeting options, and special features. Used by buying agents to determine brief relevance.

markets.description: Geographic markets this agent accepts briefs for. Used to filter brief routing.

include_countries.description: ISO country codes this agent accepts briefs for. If specified, agent only accepts briefs for these countries. Mutually exclusive with exclude_countries.

exclude_countries.description: ISO country codes this agent does NOT accept briefs for. If specified, agent accepts briefs for all countries except these. Mutually exclusive with include_countries.

errors.description: Task-specific errors and warnings (e.g., property availability issues)
